snippet.title: Simpler Times - Official Launch Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024
snippet.description:
Step into the shoes of Taina as she prepares to move out of her childhood home and begin the next chapter of her life in Simpler Times. Pack Taina’s childhood belongings for college and reflect on pivotal moments in her life in this cozy musical experience where playing old records takes you back in time.

Simpler Times is available now on PC via Steam.
